column1:
Please tell us more about the request / issue that you had faced so that we can work to improve our services.

(Please do not provide any sensitive personal information, including login passwords or one-time passwords.)

Despite having a reasonably good amount in my deposits, I am still charged an account fee. What's is the point of maintaining a deposit account if I have to spend nearly 30-40% of the interest earned on bank fee. I'm doubting of maintaining the account after being a customer for more than 7 years
Perfect by Ke Ying to handle my request swiftly and efficiently
